mapper.select: select id, notice_content description, notice_content imageUrl, notice_title title, push Type from sys_system_notice where (state = '2' or (state = '1' and sysdate() >= send_out_time)) and ( addressee_type = '1' or (addressee like concat('%', #{channel}, '%') and addressee_type = '2') or (addressee like concat('%', #{uid}, '%') and addressee_type = '3') ) and tid = #{tid}

select id, tid, notice_title, notice_content, notice_signature, send_out_gold from sys_personal_mail where (state = '2' or (state = '1' and sysdate() >= send_out_time)) and ( addressee_type = '1' or (addressee like concat('%', #{channel}, '%') and addressee_type = '2') or (addressee like concat('%', #{uid}, '%') and addressee_type = '3') ) and id not in (select personal_mail_id from sys_mail_record where addressee = #{uid} and tid = #{tid}) and tid = #{tid}

select id, mail_prop coins, personal_mail_id config_id, mail_content content, mail_title content_title, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i::%s') create_at, 2 mail_type, signature op_user, mail_title title, if(mail_state = 2, 0, 1) read_state, mail_state receive_state from sys_mail_record where addressee = #{uid} and mail_state in (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) and tid = #{tid}
